titles.title: Freedom reigns (where the spirit of the Lord is)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Where the spirit of the Lord is
There is freedom
Where the spirit of the Lord is
There is freedom

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lift Your eyes to heaven
There is freedom
Lift Your eyes to heaven
There is freedom

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Freedom reigns in this place
Showers of mercy and grace
Falling on every face
There is freedom

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If You're tired and thirsty
There is freedom
If You're tired and thirsty
There is freedom

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Give Your all to Jesus
Give him all, there is freedom
Give Your all to Jesus
There is freedom

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Freedom reigns in this place
Showers of mercy and grace
Falling on every face
There is freedom

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
If your burden's heavy
He brings freedom
If your burden's heavy
He brings freedom

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
If you're hurt and broken
He brings freedom
If you're hurt and broken
He brings freedom

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Freedom reigns in this place
Showers of mercy and grace
Falling on every face
There is freedom

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Great is Your faithfulness
Great is Your faithfulness
